section.title: Files and Directories

warning.para: These files are required for proper operation of the gDesklets platform. Manual changes can lead to unexpected behavior.

section.para: gDesklets uses the following files and directories for storing data.
The term $GDESKLETS denotes the path of the gDesklets installation, e.g. /usr/lib/gdesklets.
